title: Investigate a Data Anomaly
description: An analyst notices a sudden, unexplained spike in website traffic in a report and needs to find the cause.

tasks.description: Identify the exact date and time of the traffic spike from the analytics dashboard.
Analyze the referral sources for the traffic during the spike.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drills down into the traffic sources.

tasks.description: Discover that the spike was caused by a large amount of bot traffic from a single referral source.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the root cause as non-human traffic.

tasks.description: Apply a filter to the analytics view to exclude the bot traffic for more accurate reporting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and applies a filter to clean the data going forward.
